lead_paragraph: A North Korean suspect detained by Malaysia in connection with the bizarre airport murder of Kim Jong Nam will be deported to Pyongyang on Friday and not allowed back, the Malaysian deputy prime minister said on Friday.
snippet: A North Korean suspect detained by Malaysia in connection with the bizarre airport murder of Kim Jong Nam will be deported to Pyongyang on Friday and not allowed back, the Malaysian deputy prime minister said on Friday....

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
headline.print_headline: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
